name: Aloners (Redux)
description:
"One day, the last man on Earth came home to find a girl sleeping on his bed."

A mature story about survival, loneliness, and love, featuring:

  • a female protagonist defined through your choices
  • a male companion who reacts to your personality
  • 13 chapters, 2 endings, and hundreds of choices
  • a never-before-seen extra story

Aloners (Redux) is a re-release of the 2014 visual novel Aloners, with all-new background art and a never-before-seen extra chapter that continues the story of Trash and the protagonist.

This game contains instances of violence, strong language, and (non-explicit) scenes of a sexual nature. Player discretion advised.

The original version of Aloners remains free and is available here.
